DOC.brief_summary: To assess positive blood cultures (PBCs) in hemodialysis central venous catheter (CVC) patients using two FDA cleared devices: ClearGuard HD end caps compared to conventional end caps.

DOC.criteria: All patients dialyzing with a central venous catheter Known allergy to chlorhexidine
